00065 unsigned volatile char leds[32];         
00066 unsigned volatile char ledLength = 0;    
00067 unsigned volatile char ledIndex = 0;     
00068 
00069 
00074 void main(void)
00075 {
00076     // Set data direction of PORTB as output and turn off LEDs.
00077     DDRB = 0xff;
00078     PORTB = 0xff;
00079 
00080     // Initialize timer1
00081     TCCR1B = (1 << CS11) | (1 << CS10);
00082     TIMSK1 |= (1 << TOIE1);
00083 
00084     // Initialize SMBus
00085     SMBusInit();
00086     SMBEnable();
00087 
00088     // Enable interrupts globally
00089     __enable_interrupt();
00090     for (;;)
00091     {
00092 
00093     }
00094 }

00103 #pragma vector = TIMER1_OVF_VECT
00104 __interrupt void TCNT1_OVF_ISR(void)
00105 {
00106     unsigned char tempLength; // Only used to specify volatile access order
00107 
00108     tempLength = ledLength;
00109     // Output next LED value in LED buffer
00110   ledIndex++;
00111     if (ledIndex >= tempLength)
00112     {
00113         ledIndex = 0;
00114     }
00115     PORTB = ~leds[ledIndex];
00116 }
